Setting.Name: Use full data and marker file names in header
Use full data and marker file names in header
Use full data and marker file names in header

Comment.Text: This is the script for acquiring the EEG data during the triggered experiment. It preprocesses the EEG data, online, computes the alpha envelope per channel and broadcasts this via LSL e.g. to PsychoPy. Without this script running, the PsychoPy part will not start. You do need to change the path of the filenames.
